alert.note: Alert for Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 03 at 3:46PM EDT until April 03 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Madison County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 445 PM EDT. * At 346 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Madison, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Madison, Greenville, Lee, Hopewell, Cherry Lake, Hamburg, Hanson and Pinetta. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM EDT for Big Bend of Florida...and south central Georgia. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM EDT for Big Bend of Florida...and south central Georgia.
